title: Distributing many points on spheres: Minimal energy and designs

tldr.text: This survey discusses recent developments in the context of spherical designs and minimal energy point configurations on spheres, and proves that point sets minimising the discrete Riesz energy on S d in the hypersingular case are asymptotically uniformly distributed.
